Text: can you do so I only need to download Pokemon_Advanced_Challenge_-_362_-_Lights_Camerupt_Action instead of letting me download it all, please?

metalkitten: This is something you can configure in your bit torrent client.  Pause the torrent, set all the files' priority to 'Do not download' except the episode you want to keep.  Start the torrent and you will only download that episode.
